list_definition.definition: a mark used to mean something; a symbol
a notice set up to give information (a shopkeeper’s name, the direction of a town etc) to the public
a movement (eg a nod, wave of the hand) used to mean or represent something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He made a sign to me to keep still.

list_definition.definition: a piece of evidence suggesting that something is present or about to come

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There were no signs of life at the house and he was afraid they were away
Clouds are often a sign of rain.

list_definition.definition: to write (one’s name) on a letter, document etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He signed his name on the document.

list_definition.definition: to make a movement of the head, hand etc in order to show one’s meaning

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She signed to me to say nothing.
